entry.title: 300W LED Commercial Parking Lot Light, 5700K, Universal Mount, Bronze, AC100-277V, Street Security Lighting
entry.summary:
Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Pole Light
Price: 370.48

This 300W LED Pole Light is available at LEDMyplace’s industrial, commercial and residential line of products. Light Weight and slim designed this LED light fixture is built with the latest illumination technology, making it a perfect fit for all your outdoor lighting needs. LED Shoebox Light comes with a wide beam angle of 150 x 85 Degree giving you broader and brighter illumination for outdoor areas. Being broad-beamed and high-intensity lights, LED Street lights can save you up to 75-80% on utility bills. Available in a color temperature of 5700K this LED light gives smooth and even lighting of CRI>70 to the entire area. With 42000 lumens of brightness, you get ample lighting for your property’s outdoors.
Moreover, these lights come with one of the most versatile forms of mounting, Universal Mount that enables you to make an easy and fast installation without any hassles. Highly energy-efficient and durable these LED lights will last you for at least 50,000 hours. This LED fixture is UL and DLC-approved product for safe and hazard-proof use.

entry.title: Commercial LED Flood Lights, 150 watt, 525 Watt Replacement, IP65 Rated, 21000LM, Dimmable, Bronze, AC100-277V

Vendor: LEDMyplace Canada
Type: LED Flood Lights
Price: 214.48

This 150W LED Flood Light available in a smooth bronze finish is a part of LEDMyplace’s industrial, commercial and residential line of products. Built with the latest solid-state lighting technology, this luminaire is an ideal lighting solution for your outdoor illumination needs. This LED flood light comes with a lumen output of 21000 lumens, a wide beam angle of 150 x 85 degrees, a CCT of 5700K. Being broad-beamed and high-intensity lights, LED Floodlights are superior to spotlights. This LED flood light comes with a U-Bracket mounting. Highly energy-efficient and durable this flood light can last a lot longer than metal-halides. This LED fixture is a UL, DLC-approved product and can easily replace up to 525W of any metal-halide lighting fixture saving you marginally on utility bills.

These LED lights consume 150W of energy to replace a fixture that consumes 525W saving you marginally on those hefty utility bills. The product comes with a die-cast aluminum built making the product robust and durable. With 19000 lumens of brightness, the product is a superior luminaire to HIDs and CFLs. Ideal for garage lighting and other commercial or residential applications. The LED garage lighting fixture is an IP65 approved luminaire making it perfect for damp and dusty environments. Save up to 75% on utility bills with LED lights and get peace of mind for your investment with a 5-year limited manufacturer’s warranty.
